Content:: Abdul Ali Sabri Mohamed Raheem (born 5 January 1963) is a Sri Lankan politician and Member of Parliament.[1] Raheem was born on 5 January 1963.[1] He is the All Ceylon Makkal Congress' organiser for Puttalam District.[2] Raheem contested the 2020 parliamentary election as a Muslim National Alliance electoral alliance candidate in Puttalam District and was elected to the Parliament of Sri Lanka.[3][4][5] He voted in favor of 20 Amentment which brought [1] by the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna to strengthen the president.[6]  This article about a politician from North Western Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
